politica.title: Micuentacuentos.com Privacy Policy
politica.introduction: At Micuentacuentos.com (hereinafter, the Website), the privacy of our users is of utmost importance. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you visit and use our Website. By accessing and using the Website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
politica.serviceUse: We may collect the following types of information: Automatically Collected Information: When you access our Website, we may automatically collect certain information about your device and your use of the Website, including: Your IP address (Internet Protocol). Your browser type and browser version. Your operating system. Your internet service provider. The pages you visit on our Website. The date and time of your access. Server log data. Information You Provide: The only information you directly provide is the topic you enter to generate the story. This information is used exclusively to generate the requested story and is not permanently stored or shared with third parties. Cookies and Similar Technologies: We may use cookies (small text files that are stored in your browser) and other similar technologies to enhance your experience on the Website, personalize content, and analyze traffic. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of the Website.
politica.intellectualProperty: The collected information is used for the following purposes: Provide and Improve the Service: We use the information you enter to generate the requested stories. The automatically collected information helps us understand how users interact with the Website, which allows us to improve its operation, design, and content. Security: We may use the information to detect, prevent, and address technical or security issues, as well as to protect the integrity of the Website and our users. Analysis: We use aggregated and anonymous information to perform statistical analysis on the use of the Website, which helps us make informed decisions about its development.
politica.liability: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except in the following limited circumstances: Service Providers: We may hire external service providers to assist us with certain functions, such as data analysis and website improvement. These providers will only have access to the information necessary to perform their functions and are obligated to protect it in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Legal Requirements: We may disclose your personal information if required by law or in response to a court order, subpoena, or other valid legal process. Protection of Rights: We may disclose information when we believe in good faith that it is necessary to protect our rights, property, or safety, or the rights, property, or safety of our users or others.
politica.privacy: In accordance with applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights: Right of Access: You can request information about what personal data we have about you and a copy of that data. Right to Rectification: You can request that inaccurate or incomplete personal data we have about you be corrected. Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten): You can request that your personal data be deleted under certain circumstances. Right to Restriction of Processing: You can request that the processing of your personal data be restricted under certain circumstances. Right to Data Portability: You can request to receive the personal data you have provided to us in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format, and to transmit it to another data controller. Right to Object: You can object to the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances. Right not to be subject to automated individual decision-making: You have the right not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing, including profiling, which produces legal effects concerning you or similarly significantly affects you. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us through the contact information provided in section 8. We may need to verify your identity before responding to your request.
politica.googleAdsense: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, you should be aware that no data transmission over the Internet or electronic storage system is completely secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.
politica.links: Our Website may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's website. We strongly recommend that you review the privacy policy of every website you visit, as we have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites.
